name: Island Navigator
rule_text:
When this creature crews a Vehicle, you may tap target creature.
When this creature crews a Vehicle, gain 2 life.
flavor_text: In the heart of the storm, a beacon of hope.
art_prompt: Island Navigator, original concept, Magic the Gathering art, spec art, a Polynesian navigator steering a ship through a storm using a magical compass, dark, turbulent, magical, in the style of surreal realism, oil painting, by Raymond Swanland and Paul Gauguin

name: Spirit Shield
rule_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 for each white symbol in the mana costs of permanents you control.
When Spirit Shield enters the battlefield, if your devotion to white is more than 3, you gain life equal to your devotion to white.
flavor_text: In the light of the divine, no harm shall pass.
art_prompt: Spirit Shield, from Magic the Gathering lore, Magic the Gathering art, spec art, a spectral shield deflecting a powerful magical attack in a dark, mystical forest, ethereal, luminous, mystical, in the style of surrealism and symbolism, by John Avon and Gustave Moreau

name: Volcano Acolyte
rule_text:
Lifelink
Whenever you cast a spell that targets Volcano Acolyte, you gain 1 life.
Devotion to White — Volcano Acolyte has protection from red as long as your devotion to white is more than your devotion to any other color.
flavor_text: In the searing heat, tranquility.
art_prompt: Volcano Acolyte, original, Magic the Gathering art, spec art, a fiery mage summoning a volcanic eruption, dramatic, intense, in the style of Romanticism, oil painting, by John Howe and J.M.W. Turner

name: God of the Sea
rule_text:
God of the Sea has hexproof as long as your devotion to white is less than five.
At the beginning of your upkeep, if your devotion to white is five or more, put a flood counter on target land. As long as that land has a flood counter on it, it's an Island in addition to its other types.
Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 1 life for each creature you control.
art_prompt: God of the Sea, from Greek mythology, Magic the Gathering art, spec art, a powerful sea deity summoning a tidal wave in a stormy ocean, dramatic, intense, in the style of Romanticism and Realism, oil painting, by John Howe and J.M.W. Turner

name: Ocean Navigator
rule_text:
Ocean Navigator gets +1/+1 as long as you control an Island.
Whenever Ocean Navigator deals combat damage to a player, you may draw a card.
flavor_text: In every wave, a story yet untold.
art_prompt: Ocean Navigator, from Polynesian seafaring traditions, Magic the Gathering art, spec art, a Polynesian sea captain navigating her ship through a stormy sea at night, dramatic, tense, realistic, in the style of Romanticism, oil painting, by Raymond Swanland and Paul Gauguin

name: Tidal Knowledge
rule_text: Scry 2. If you control an Island, draw a card.
flavor_text: In the sea's rhythm, wisdom finds its tide.
art_prompt: Tidal Knowledge, original concept, Magic the Gathering art, spec art, a mage drawing knowledge from the sea, vibrant, dynamic, ethereal, in the style of Ukiyo-e and Impressionism, by Yoshitaka Amano and Claude Monet

name: Spirit of the Sea
rule_text:
Islandwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.)
When Spirit of the Sea deals combat damage to a player, you may reveal the top card of your library. If it's a land card, put it onto the battlefield. Otherwise, put it into your hand.
Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
flavor_text: A ripple of hope in the vast ocean.
art_prompt: Spirit of the Sea, original concept, Magic the Gathering art, spec art, an ethereal sea spirit rising from the ocean and controlling a massive wave, ethereal, luminous, fluid, in the style of Art Nouveau and Romanticism, by John Avon and Alphonse Mucha

name: Polynesian Deity
rule_text:
Islandwalk
When Polynesian Deity enters the battlefield, return target creature to its owner's hand.
Whenever Polynesian Deity attacks, you may return target creature defending player controls to its owner's hand.
flavor_text: The relentless surge of the sea.
art_prompt: Polynesian Deity, from Polynesian mythology, Magic the Gathering art, spec art, a powerful deity summoning a volcanic eruption on a lush island, vibrant, dynamic, realistic with a touch of surrealism, in the style of Raymond Swanland and Paul Gauguin, digital painting.

name: Shadowed Navigator
rule_text:
Pay 2 life: Shadowed Navigator gains unblockable until end of turn.
When Shadowed Navigator deals combat damage to a player, that player discards a card.
flavor_text: A whisper in the dark, a ripple in the water.
art_prompt: Shadowed Navigator, original concept, Magic the Gathering art, spec art, a cloaked figure navigating through a shadowy realm with a magical compass, dark, ethereal, mystical, in the style of Surrealism and Gothic, by John Howe and Salvador Dali

name: Spirit's Call
rule_text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand. If a creature died this turn, you may pay {1}{B} instead. If you've cast another black spell this turn, you may return an additional creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: Echoes of the Isle of Echoes.
art_prompt: Spirit's Call, original concept, Magic the Gathering art, spec art, an ethereal spirit beckoning in a dark, misty forest, ethereal, luminous, mysterious, in the style of surrealism and symbolism, by Yoshitaka Amano and Gustave Moreau

name: Volcanic Ritual
rule_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.
Target player loses life equal to the sacrificed creature's power.
If the sacrificed creature was a Demon, draw a card.
flavor_text: Life feeds on death, in the volcano's heart.
art_prompt: Volcanic Ritual, original, Magic the Gathering art, spec art, a mage performing a ritual in a volcanic landscape, dramatic, vibrant, dynamic, in the style of Romanticism/Expressionism, oil/digital painting, by John Howe/Yoshitaka Amano/Frank Frazetta and J.M.W. Turner
artist_credit: John Howe/Yoshitaka Amano/Frank Frazetta, J.M.W. Turner

name: Kana, Goddess of the Underworld
rule_text:
Deathtouch, Lifelink
Whenever a creature an opponent controls dies, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.
flavor_text: The cold, unyielding grip of death.
art_prompt: Kana, Goddess of the Underworld, from Magic the Gathering, spec art, commanding spirits in her shadowy realm, dark, ethereal, mysterious, in the style of Gothic Surrealism, digital painting, by Yoshitaka Amano and Gustave Doré

name: Volcanic Eruption
rule_text: Volcanic Eruption deals 2 damage to any target. Landfall — If a land entered the battlefield under your control this turn, Volcanic Eruption deals 3 damage to that target instead.
flavor_text: The earth trembles, the sky blazes.
art_prompt: Volcanic Eruption, original, Magic the Gathering art, spec art, a mage harnesses the power of an erupting volcano, dramatic, intense, in the style of Romanticism and Japanese ukiyo-e, bold colors, dynamic lines, by Yoshitaka Amano and J.M.W. Turner

name: Fire Dancer
rule_text:
Whenever you cast a spell, Fire Dancer gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
Fire Dancer can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.
flavor_text: The rhythm of rebellion, the dance of defiance.
art_prompt: Fire Dancer, from Magic the Gathering, spec art, a fiery elf or djinn woman performing a ritualistic fire dance in a dark, rocky landscape, mesmerizing, intense, passionate, in the style of fantasy realism with a touch of impressionism, digital painting, by Todd Lockwood and J.M.W. Turner

name: Spirit of the Volcano
rule_text:
Evoke 1RR (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)
When Spirit of the Volcano enters the battlefield, it deals damage equal to its power to each creature without flying.
Mountainwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Mountain.)
flavor_text: The earth's fury, the sky's lament.
art_prompt: Spirit of the Volcano, original, Magic the Gathering art, spec art, a towering spirit of molten rock and fire erupting from a volcano on a stormy island, dramatic, powerful, majestic, in the style of Romanticism and Surrealism, digital painting, by John Howe and J.M.W. Turner

name: Ancestral Fire God
rule_text: This creature gets +1/+0 for each red mana symbol in the mana costs of permanents you control. When this creature enters the battlefield, it deals damage equal to your devotion to red to any target. At the beginning of your upkeep, if your devotion to red is five or more, Ancestral Fire God deals 5 damage to any target.
flavor_text: The heat of devotion, the blaze of wrath.
art_prompt: Ancestral Fire God, original, Magic the Gathering art, spec art, a fiery deity summoning a fireball in a volcanic landscape, dramatic, warm, stormy, in the style of realism with a touch of surrealism, oil painting, by Raymond Swanland and J.M.W. Turner

name: Jungle Explorer
rule_text:
Landfall - Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on Jungle Explorer.
When Jungle Explorer enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.
flavor_text: With each step, the jungle yields its strength.
art_prompt: Jungle Explorer, original concept, Magic the Gathering art, spec art, a determined explorer cutting through a dense jungle to reveal a hidden temple, vibrant, lush, intricate, in the style of Realism and Art Nouveau, oil painting and digital art, by Kekai Kotaki and Frida Kahlo.

name: Verdant Blessing
rule_text:
Kicker {2}{G} (You may pay an additional {2}{G} as you cast this spell.)
Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library. If Verdant Blessing was kicked, instead search your library for two basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.
flavor_text: In the heart of the forest, a whisper of growth.
art_prompt: Verdant Blessing, original, Magic the Gathering art, spec art, a druid casting a spell of growth in a lush forest at dawn, serene, tranquil, rejuvenating, in the style of Art Nouveau and Romanticism, oil painting, by John Howe and Alphonse Mucha

name: Spirit of the Canopy
rule_text:
Reach
Landfall - Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on Spirit of the Canopy.
Whenever Spirit of the Canopy deals combat damage to a player, you may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield.
flavor_text: As the jungle thrived, so too did its guardian spirit.
art_prompt: Spirit of the Canopy, original concept, Magic the Gathering art, spec art, a majestic spirit creature nurturing a glowing seed in a lush forest canopy, ethereal, glowing, vibrant, in the style of Art Nouveau and Romanticism, by Brian Froud and Alphonse Mucha

name: Volcano God's Emissary
rule_text:
Trample
Whenever Volcano God's Emissary deals combat damage to a player, you may pay {2}{G}{G}. If you do, create a token that's a copy of a land you control.
Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Volcano God's Emissary gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: From the heart of fire, life blooms anew.
art_prompt: Volcano God's Emissary, original, Magic the Gathering art, spec art, a fiery elemental being summons a volcanic eruption in a stormy landscape, dramatic, atmospheric, in the style of Romanticism and Baroque, oil painting or digital art, by John Howe or Yoshitaka Amano and J.M.W. Turner or Caravaggio
artist_credit: John Howe or Yoshitaka Amano, J.M.W. Turner or Caravaggio

name: Navigational Compass
rule_text:
When Navigational Compass enters the battlefield, scry 1.
{T}: Scry 1.
flavor_text: Guided by stars, steared by fate.
art_prompt: Navigational Compass, original concept, Magic the Gathering art, spec art, a magical compass floating in a dark forest, its needle spinning rapidly, eerie, mysterious, in the style of surrealism and symbolism, oil painting or digital art, by John Howe and Salvador Dali

name: Volcanic Rock
rule_text:
Volcanic Rock enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {C}.
Sacrifice Volcanic Rock: Add {R}{R}.
flavor_text: A slumbering giant, its dreams of fire and fury.
art_prompt: Volcanic Rock, original concept, Magic the Gathering art, spec art, a massive, molten rock formation violently erupting in a desolate, rocky landscape, dramatic, intense, surreal, in the style of Raymond Swanland and J.M.W. Turner, oil painting, digital art.

name: Spirit Totem
rule_text:
{T}: Add one mana of any color.
Creatures you control get +0/+1.
At the beginning of your end step, if you control three or more Spirits, draw a card.
flavor_text: Echoing the chants of the islanders.
art_prompt: Spirit Totem, original concept, Magic the Gathering art, spec art, a glowing totem pole in a mystical forest at twilight, ethereal, mystical, serene, in the style of realism and symbolism, oil painting, by John Howe and Emily Carr

name: The Great Canoe
rule_text:
Crew 4 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 4 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn)
Whenever The Great Canoe becomes crewed, draw a card.
Whenever The Great Canoe deals combat damage to a player, you may exile target nonland permanent that player controls.
flavor_text: A testament to the alliance formed in the face of adversity.
art_prompt: The Great Canoe, original concept, Magic the Gathering art, spec art, a mystical Polynesian canoe navigating a stormy vortex, vibrant, dynamic, dramatic, in the style of surreal realism, digital painting, by Raymond Swanland and Hokusai
